name: Plastic Rulers
description: Rulers made from durable plastic material, commonly used in classrooms and offices.

name: Plastic Scissors
description: Lightweight scissors with plastic handles and stainless steel blades, suitable for children's use.

name: Plastic Pencil Cases
description: Cases made from plastic for storing pencils, pens, erasers, and other stationery items.

name: Plastic Erasers
description: Soft plastic erasers used for erasing pencil marks and mistakes without damaging paper.

name: Plastic Notebooks
description: Notebooks with plastic covers for durability and protection against spills and tears.

name: Plastic Clipboards
description: Clipboards made from sturdy plastic material, providing a firm writing surface for students and professionals.

name: Plastic Book Covers
description: Transparent plastic covers for protecting books from wear and tear, spills, and scratches.

name: Plastic Protractors
description: Protractors made from clear plastic for measuring angles accurately in geometry and drafting tasks.

name: Plastic Pencil Sharpeners
description: Handheld sharpeners made from plastic for sharpening pencils quickly and efficiently.

name: Plastic Storage Bins
description: Stackable bins made from durable plastic material for organizing and storing stationery items.
